title: 输入/fml confirm来确认删除的方块后，还是不动。
author: oqingzhao
txt_content:
/fml confirm or or /fml cancel to proceed.
Alternativel
y start the server with -Dfml.queryResult=confirm or -Dfml.queryResult=cancel to preselect the answer.
[16:20:19 ERROR]: An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Mod%20Versions/Mekanism.txt.'
[16:20:40 ERROR]: An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Donators/Mekanism.txt.'
[16:22:01 信息]: confirmed
不动了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
boqingzhao 发表于 2019-7-6 16:51
还是不行
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Initial heap size set to a larger value than t ...
你原本给我的启动参数就有别的地方有问题

试试 
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_202\bin\javaw.exe" -Djline.terminal=jline.UnsupportedTerminal -Dfml.queryResult=confirm -jar KCauldron.jar
复制代码

replies.author: oqingzhao
replies.txt_content:
807709429 发表于 2019-7-6 16:30
直接删除world文件一样de
什么？？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 在启动参数中添加 -Dfml.queryResult=confirm 就行

replies.author: qse
replies.txt_content:
dropbox由于某些不可描述的原因在国内上不去 连接不到服务器
建议魔法上网

replies.author: oqingzhao
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-6 16:33
在启动参数中添加 -Dfml.queryResult=confirm 就行
具体是什么
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_202\bin\javaw.exe" -Xms7000M -Xmx5000M -Djline.terminal=jline.UnsupportedTerminal -jar KCauldron.jar-Dfml.queryResult=confirm
这样不行

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
boqingzhao 发表于 2019-7-6 16:40
具体是什么
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_202\bin\javaw.exe" -Xms7000M -Xmx5000M -Djline.terminal ...
放在前面
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_202\bin\javaw.exe" -Xms7000M -Xmx5000M -Djline.terminal=jline.UnsupportedTerminal -Dfml.queryResult=confirm -jar KCauldron.jar复制代码
